item.title: Win10 Install Hugo
item.description: install choco 打开PowerShell，粘贴下面的命令，回车。 Set-ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Scope Process -Force; iex ((New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://chocolatey.org/install.ps1')) 参考链接 install hugo choco install hugo -confirm 参考链接
